New Records: Cole Palmer scored his first senior England goal from the penalty spot
Key Match Events: Cole Palmer scored the first goal for England with a penalty
Trent Alexander-Arnold scored a volley for 2-0
Conor Gallagher had a shot denied by the goalkeeper
Harry Kane completed the scoring with a close-range finish
Pre-Game Insights: Gareth Southgate decided to make his move and introduce key players from the bench, including Harry Kane and James Maddison
The team was experimental, with several debuts, including Jarrad Branthwaite and Adam Wharton
Post-Match Reflections: Gareth Southgate praised Conor Gallagher for his performance and singled him out for post-match praise
The team showed their attacking riches and were able to cut loose and enjoy the game
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was a warm-up for the Euro 2024 tournament opener against Serbia on Sunday week
The atmosphere was subdued in the first half, but improved after the restart
